options.name: Trolleater
options.description: Fortitude (5+), Multiple Wounds (2, towards Height 3).

options.name: Godspeaker
options.description: Attached. The bearer and its unit gain Fearless, Unstable.

options.name: Scraplord
options.description: Commanding Presence (12", Scrapling). As long as the model is joined to a unit of Scraplings, the model counts as being Height 1 for the purposes of allocating Ranged Attacks.

options.name: Hoardmaster
options.description: +1 Arm and Weapon Master. The bearer is considered as being equipped with Hand Weapon, Great Weapon, Halberd, Paired Weapons, Iron Fist. The bearer cannot take Weapon Enchantments.

options.name: Headhunter
options.description: Roll a D6 at the end of any Melee Phase in which the bearer did not Break from combat and caused one or more HP losses on enemy models. On a roll of 3+, the bearer's model recovers 1 HP.

options.name: Firebrand
options.description: Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks), Flaming Attacks, Resistance (Flaming Attacks). The bearer can cast Fireball (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell (3+) and automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

options.name: Gut Roarer
options.description: Channel (1), Horror.

options.name: Spinesplitter
options.description: The bearer's model part gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str, +1 AP).

options.name: Rottenjaw
options.description: Poison Attacks, Immune (Poison Attacks). Friendly Kin-Eater units may reroll failed Ambush rolls while the bearer is on the Battlefield.

options.name: Banner of the Gyengget
options.description: The bearer's unit gains First Strike (re-roll natural to-hit and to-wound rolls of 1).

options.name: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky
options.description: One use only. May be activated when Declaring a Charge. The bearer's unit gains Swiftstride with Duration One Turn.

options.name: Skull of Qenghet
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Terror.

options.name: Khagadai's Legacy
options.description: Multiple Wounds (D3).

options.name: Viper's Curse
options.description:
Poison Attacks (Melee & Shooting).
Shots set to 4, Str 4, AP 2 and always hits on 4+. It cannot benefit from Area Attack, Direct Hit if it has it.

options.name: Heart-Ripper
options.description: +1 AP, Lethal Strike and always hits at least on 3+.

options.name: Ritual Bloodletter
options.description: +1 Att. While the wielder's unit is Engaged in Combat, the wielder must reroll rolls of '1' for its casting attempts.

options.name: Aurochs Resilience
options.description: Mountain Hide and +1 Res. The model automatically fails all Special Saves.

options.name: Wrestler's Belt
options.description: +1 Arm, +1 Str and Devastating Charge (+1 Arm).

options.name: Mammoth-Hide Cloak
options.description: +1 Arm. Attacks against the wearer can never have Str above 5.

options.name: Lygur's Tongue
options.description: Afflict (-2 Off).

options.name: Yeti Furs
options.description: Touch of Frost, Strider.

options.name: Rampager's Chain
options.description: The bearer gains Stomp Attacks (D3+1), and all models in the bearer's unit must reroll failed to-wound rolls with Stomp Attacks.

options.name: Throwing Weapons (4+), Iron Fist and Poison Attacks (Shooting)
Brace of Ogre Pistols (4+) and Lethal Strike (Shooting)
Brace of Ogre Pistols (4+) and Accurate
